examples.example: 为了实现梦想，他努力拼搏，终于在短短几年内积累了超过十万元的财富。

translate.english: In order to realize his dream, he worked hard and finally accumulated more than one hundred thousand yuan of wealth in just a few years.

examples.example: 这次的公益活动筹集到了超过十万元的善款，能帮助很多有需要的人。

translate.english: This public welfare activity has raised more than one hundred thousand yuan in donations, which can help many people in need.

examples.example: 经过多年的努力奋斗，他终于拥有了价值超十万的资产。

translate.english: After years of hard work and struggle, he finally owned assets worth more than one hundred thousand.
